Title: Sleeveless Illusion Sheer Evening Gown

----

Sku: JC4199

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 10, 14, 4, 12, 6, 8

----

Colors: silver, gold, black

----

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: JC4199-silver-sleeveless-illusion-sheer-evening-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: The princess scoop neck is embellished with sequins and rhinestones that extend to the bust of the bodice, then are placed over a sheer inlay at the midriff. The sequins also create a mini skirt design while the tulle skirt trains to the floor. The back of the gown has an oval cutout.
